price: 46. Dis : « Ô Allah ! Toi le Créateur Premier des cieux et de la terre, Qui Connais aussi bien les choses insondables que les choses observables, c’est Toi Qui jugeras entre Tes serviteurs (et trancheras) leurs différends.
arabic: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ عَٰلِمَ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ أَنتَ تَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَ عِبَادِكَ فِي مَا كَانُواْ فِيهِ يَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: quli al-lahuma fāṭira al-samāwāti wal-arḍi ʿālima al-ghaybi wal-shahādati anta taḥkumu bayna ʿibādika fī mā kānū fīhi yakhtalifūna
